attributes.action: Stop spending our Tax on wars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every day people in our own Country,are
 refused drugs on cost to the NHS.
We have a big problem with the lack of homes for working familys. The older
people have lost pensions,and find it hard to manage.Road charging is in our view,a tax to pay for the wars,our Country is involed in.So bring home our men,and spend the saved billions on the above problems.Then we will remember you
as a good PM.Not a USA lap dog.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
